title: BRIEF-Advanced Braking Technology Says Q1 Fy20 Operating Sales Up 41%
text:
BRIEF-Advanced Braking Technology Says Q1 Fy20 Operating Sales Up 41%

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Oct 28, 2019 19:43)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Advanced Braking Technology Says Q1 Fy20 Operating Sales Up 41% Oct 28 (Reuters) - Advanced Braking Technology Ltd : * ADVANCED BRAKING TECHNOLOGY LTD - Q1 FY20 OPERATING SALES 41% GREATER THAN CORRESPONDING Q1 FY19 PERIOD * ADVANCED BRAKING TECHNOLOGY - HAS BEEN ABLE TO ACHIEVE ITS OBJECTIVE OF RETURNING TO BREAK-EVEN POSITION THAT WAS ANNOUNCED IN Q3 FY19

BRIEF-Advanced Braking Technology Says Q1 Fy20 Operating Sales Up 41%
description: BRIEF-Advanced Braking Technology Says Q1 Fy20 Operating Sales Up 41%
